properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 2:07PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Mississippi...

Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County
Pearl River Near Ratliff's Ferry affecting Madison and Rankin
Counties

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Pearl River near Lena
* from late tonight until further notice.
* At  1:30 PM Tuesday the stage was 22.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 24.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after
midnight tonight and will continue to rise to near 25.0 feet
tomorrow evening.
* Impact...At 24.0 feet...Minor flooding of agricultural and pasture
land is occurring along the river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
